title: Privacy Policy
body:
Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains what information we collect and how we use it.

Information We Collect

CMB Quiz Hub is a static website. We do not require user accounts, and we do not actively collect personal information like your name, email address, or phone number through the site itself.

Like most websites, our hosting provider may collect standard server logs, which might include anonymous information such as your IP address, browser type, pages visited, and the time of your visit. This data is used for statistical purposes and to maintain the security and functionality of the site. We do not link this anonymous data to any personal identifiers.

Use of Cookies

We may use local storage in your browser to save preferences like your theme choice (light/dark mode) or to potentially resume quizzes. This data is stored only on your device and is not transmitted to us.

Third-Party Links

Our website may contain links to external sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third-party sites.

Source of Questions Disclaimer

The questions provided on CMB Quiz Hub are compiled from various publicly available sources, including previous year question papers and educational materials accessible online. We do not claim copyright ownership of these questions. This site is intended for educational and practice purposes only. If you believe any content infringes on your copyright, please contact us at cmb432hz@gmail.com, and we will address it promptly.

Policy Updates

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.

This policy is effective as of October 28, 2025.

If you have any questions about this policy, please contact us.
